question: I am 40yr female who have diabetes insipudis for 2/yrs is there a cure? I am currently taking desmopression 4 times a day.I started out with taken 8 pills a day put I kept getting muscle spasms.I am unable to lose weigh,i have carried the exact weight for the 5yrs diet is poor do to all the nausea .also my vision is blurry my optometreist thinks its link to the insipudis..my ENDO DR,says my tumuor is on back of my pituitary is not big enough to affect my vision.my vision has been poor for year now also make me feel discombobulated.so please help me.
title: diabetes insipudis
